So you talked about scripting as it relates to giving an advantage, but what about bots that play the game completely so people can farm IP/XP? Admittedly this mostly shows up in Co-op vs AI games where it's less important but it's still really annoying.

I've been in a game where three of the players on my team were bots. They all took ghost/heal, had gibberish summoner names, bought no items, and repeatedly charged into towers to die. 

It not only makes the game less fun, but makes it difficult for players to test out whatever build or strategy they are investigating because all the balance between teams is screwed up if 3 players aren't playing properly.

Can you please take steps to prevent these bot scripts completely? Don't allow it just because it's in a Co-op vs AI game.
